gmsave.LoadMap.description:
GMSAVE [Server] 

[string] mapData
  The JSON encoded string containing all the map data.

[Player] ply
  The player to load positions for

gmsave.PlayerLoad.description:
GMSAVE [Server] 

[Player] ply
  The player to "load" values for

[table] data
  A table containing Origin and Angle keys for position and angles to set.

gmsave.SaveMap.description:
GMSAVE [Server] 

[Player] ply
  The player, whose position should be saved for loading the save

gmsave.ShouldSaveEntity.description:
GMSAVE [Server] Returns if we should save this entity in a duplication or a map save or not.

[Entity] ent
  The entity

[table] t
  A table containing classname key with entities classname.
